Html:
Hi,

When loading the graph sometimes the X-axis won't appear unless I zoom in/out (after which I can fit to view and everything's displayed fine). Following is a screenshot:

http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4580/d3axisvanish.png

If anyone could give me an idea of why this is happening or how to fix it, that would be great.

Thanks.

I would recommend switching to the future library (http://d3future.codeplex.com/)  I've had much better results with it.

There may be some work converting between the two however.
